Name: 猜拳为尊
About the game: One night, you receive an origami letter. On the front of the letter was written in four large characters, 'Honor your fist guessing,' and signed in 'silver'. The contents of the letter were strange, a few crude pictures and a few short lines. You did not think much, in the computer desk before the ambush case is too long, gradually sleep...... ...... However, the picture of the letter in your mind, is becoming more and more clear. ps. The game is a story-driven role-playing game in which you enter a fantasy world of 'guess-guessing' using an origami letter. In the game, you will learn about scissors, rock, paper, these three gestures behind the three large doors, and the earthshaking power of guessing-fist in the ancient times. The story, the puzzle, the adventure, what unknowns and dreams lie ahead? Go for it, your guess-guessing journey is about to begin
